---CONSULTAR los archivos .csv de vehicle_registration
USE electric_vehicle_explorer;
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/month=01/vehicle_registration_2024-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--Select data from folder
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/month=01/*.csv',       --solo lee los archivos .csv dentro del directorio
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--Select data from subfolders
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/**',   --eleccciona los archivos de todas las subcarpetas (mismo nivel)
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--Get data from more than one file
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/month=01/*',          --lee archivos de dos carpetas distintas (mismo esquema)
                'vehicle_registration_csv/year=2024/month=03/*'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--Use more than 1 wildcard character
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',   --leer los datos de todos los años, todos los meses y todos los archivos.
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--File metadata: permite obtener información metadata sobre el archivo que se está consultando.
  --function filename()
SELECT
    TOP 100 
    result.filename() AS file_name,     --obtiene una nueva columna ("file_name") con el nombre de los archivos que se están consultado
    COUNT(1) AS record_count            --obtiene el numero de registros de cada uno de los archivos que se estan consultando
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER BY result.filename();

  --limit data using filename()
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('vehicle_registration_2024-01.csv', 'vehicle_registration_2025-01.csv' )
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER BY result.filename();

  --use filepath() function
SELECT
    result.filepath() AS file_path,     --nueva columna "file_path" que muestra la ruta de los archivos que se estan consultando
    result.filepath(1) AS year,         --referencia al primer wildcard de la ruta BULK
    result.filepath(2) AS month,        --referencia al segundo wildcard de la ruta BULK
    COUNT(1) AS record_count            --cantidad de registros del año y mes consultados
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filepath(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY result.filepath();

  --use filepath() function in the WHERE clause
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_csv/year=*/month=*/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2024'
    and result.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08')      --consulta los meses especificos del año 2024
GROUP BY result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);
